name: Juicy Slice
description:
Ultimate Slice Game!

In this challenge, use a variety of knives, one handed and two handed daggers, axes and maces to cut the blocks into pieces.
Carefully aim to hit the best spot, but don't let the blocks fall off your screen, and don't run out of weapons.

Each knife has a unique damage pattern! Try each one and master it perfectly!
Get medals for mastery of each of the available weapons passing with it the challenge to the end!

Do you have what it makes to be the best block breaking sword fighter? Find out right now!
